channel.title: Volition 718 - Where Your Destiny Begins!
channel.description:
Volition 718-where your destiny begins! Owner: Odin Admin: Spot open Moderator: Zack Moderator: Spot open
Forums [url=http://volition.netau.net/]http://volition.netau.net/[/url]
DownloadClient [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/52678205/Volition%20718.jar]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/52678205/Volition%20718.jar[/url]
Volition has a lot to offer you as players. Great skilling, economy based server. It's brand new and I'm looking for a good start, with a basic source. If you wanna join click Forums or Play Now right above!
Home [img]http://s21.postimg.org/tkztnd2pf/Picture_4.jpg?noCache=1431583767[/img]
Training [img]http://s3.postimg.org/ks07phmpr/Picture_1.jpg?noCache=1431582913[/img]
Pvm, Skilling and Wild Teleports [img]http://s27.postimg.org/r02xw0wzz/Picture_3.jpg?noCache=1431583101[/img]
120 capes for every skill! [img]http://s22.postimg.org/m2oj7ninx/Picture_5.jpg?noCache=1431583310[/img]
My In-game name is Bloodborne If the owner ask's who referred you say Bloodborne Did

item.title: Volition 718 - Where Your Destiny Begins!
item.dc:creator: @khayam khayam
item.description:
@khayam wrote:

Keep it up, try make pictures bigger and show more media of the server and also give more detail, goodluck.

Read full topic

item.title: Volition 718 - Where Your Destiny Begins!
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Your media is too small to make out what exactly you are trying to address. Also you should probably add more media other than just teles. Think outside the box. The more creativity you put into your advertisement thread, the more eyes it will get, as you are essentially attempting people to try-out your product.

Read full topic
